title: Emprox Oceanic Challenger Series 2019 Recruitment is now underway!
body:
Emprox is an up and coming esports brand and has ended up competing for the last two splits of the Oceanic Challenger Series.
---------------------------------------------------------
**Accomplishments**
**Emprox 2017** Split 2 (Lynx)
* 5th place finish against 8 teams

**Emprox 2018 **
* 5th place finish against 14 teams

3 of the former Emprox players were also chosen for the Queensland team and competed on stage against some of OPL finest. Emprox has created exceptional players through every team they have put together. Emprox has gone through its growing and learning phase and now our sights are truly set on the Oceanic Pro League. We want to work with players who share a similar goal and dont shy away from hard work.

If you think you have what it takes then head over to our website.
[Apply Here ](http://emproxgg.com/ocsrecruitment/)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/EmproxGG): 
[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWf9PK_QF18ncbZK4kTEPnA): 
[Discord](https://discord.gg/FWHyjHC):

replies.body: Not sure why you guys putting this on here when your main coach "Caleb" actively tries to steal players from upcoming amature teams. Even though he goes to their owner "I will coach your team" but really behind their back tell the players suck up to me and I will put u in ocs. LULOMAGUD!!! No thanks I would never want to join such a shady team that has a coach who works like that.

This is the first I have heard of this, however, it is common for a coach to work with other amateur teams in the offseason. We are happy to launch an internal investigation if you are able to provide any supporting evidence in accordance with the claim. We do pride ourselves with the hard work and integrity as a brand so we take claims like this seriously. 
In terms of why we put the application here is due to the newer talent pool of players are still rising through the ranks and we want to let them know we are an avenue to explore. Although we do understand the frustration of amateur teams losing players to teams in a higher league as we do lose our players to the OPL teams after every split. This, unfortunately, is a common feat as players wish to progress further in their career and progressing through the league does help them build a reputation.
Hello Mystic are you able to access the website now?

Nah

Not Found

The requested URL /ocsrecruitment/ was not found on this server.

Additionally, a 404 Not Found error was encountered while trying to use an ErrorDocument to handle the request.

Here is a link to our website:
http://www.emproxgg.com/
You should be able to access the application near the bottom of the home homepage.
